{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=XD |revision=(2050X) |asin= |fcc_date=09/02/2010 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=media streamer |fcc_id=TC22050X |ic_id=5959A-2050X |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=NXP |cpu1_model=PNX­8935 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1208UDC-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H51083 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Roku XD Wireless Module |wi1_module_if=module |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43231 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Streaming Media Player}} :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models]
[[Roku XD Wireless Module]] *The [[Roku XD]] is a Netflix/Pandora/MLB TV streaming device with built-in 2x2 MIMO single band WiFi. :Unlike the previous generation of [[Roku]] devices, the XD now holds the wireless components :on the main board along with two U.FL connectors in addition to two onboard antennas.
===FCC Info=== *[[Roku XD (2050X)]] :CPU: [[NXP]] PNX­8935 @400MHz (Nexperia Semi/Trident MS) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43231KFBG (2T2R 802.11bgn 300Mbps) :RAM: 4x [[Samsung]] K4H51083 (4x 64MB) 256MB (SDRAM DDR) :Flash: [[Samsung]] K9F1208UDC-PCB0 64MB (NAND TSOP-48)
__NOTOC__
